General.Name: Saudi Advanced Industries Co.
General.Description: Saudi Advanced Industries Company invests in various industrial projects in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It operates in Petrochemical, Glass Industry, Industrial Services, and Financial Services and Investments segments. The company, through its investments, offers heavy maintenance and modification services for commercial and military aircrafts; and aromatic or ring compounds, pure tralic acids, and polyester ores for bottles and packaging. It also provides marine and geophysical studies for the exploration and development of hydrocarbons, minerals, and groundwater sources; seismic survey, ocean study, geodetic studies, and map preparation for the exploration of natural resources; drilling services for oil and gas extraction; heavy sealers for drilling in the Gulf water; and multi-purpose marine self-propelled platforms for oil wells. In addition, it manufactures petrochemicals and glass; and provides mortgage services to individuals and banks. Further, the company wholesales and retails glass; provides raw materials for glass and accessories; management of mining quarries, as well as offers coloring, chopping, and installation of glass. Saudi Advanced Industries Company was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Takhasusi St with Othman bin Affan Rd, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 11553
